items.title: GB win battle of unbeaten teams to reach mixed semis
items.description: Team GB's mixed doubles curlers clinched their place in the Winter Olympics semi-finals with two matches to spare, after statement victories over heav...

items.title: Man charged with 33 sexual offences in London
items.description: Adebayo Adeyemi, 58, is charged with offences alleged to have taken place between 2003 and 2019.

items.title: US wants Russia and Ukraine to end war by June, says Zelensky
items.description: The Ukrainian leader says difficult issues remain, as Russia carries out further strikes on energy facilities.

items.title: S Korean crypto firm accidentally pays out $40bn in bitcoin
items.description: The company quickly realised its mistake and managed to recover virtually all the missing tokens from customers.

items.title: 'What a moment!' - Shepherd takes four wickets in one over
